content: move straight into working the heel though this desired length ending on ws pattern only features 2 sizes the stitch counts are based on the stockinette gauge the nature of the ribbed instep heel turn stitches allows for lots of versatility between sizes and an row 1 rs s1 k 17 19 sts ssk k1 turn adjustment in needle size might also be helpful in row 2 ws s1 p5 p2tog p1 turn decreasing or extending the sizing row 3 rs s1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn cuff row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog with smaller needles co 64 72 sts using p1 turn long-tail tubular cast on work set-up row 1 repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have and 2 then join to work in the round note been worked and 18 20 stitches remain the long-tail tubular cast-on can be replaced ending on ws with a regular long-tail cast-on the german twisted cast-on or the alternating norwegian gusset cast-on n1 knit across heel sts pick up and work 1 round of 1x1 twisted ribbing k1tbl p1 knit 17 19 sts along the slipped st edge around of the heel flap note pick up an complete chart a b the chart is repeated additional stitch if it helps to close any 4xs across each round switch to larger gaps just be sure to repeat on opposite needles side at the beg of the next round work 1x1 twisted n2 work in pattern across 16 18 ribbing across 32 36 instep sts you will now instep sts work back and forth along the rem 32 36 sts n3 continue in pattern across instep to complete the heel flap sts n4 pick up and knit 17 19 sts along heel flap remaining slipped st edge of heel flap row 1 rs s1 k1 across turn adding additional st if necessary knit 9 row 2 ws s1 purl across turn 10 heel sts © dawn henderson page �3 of �5 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com lyne socks this pattern is for personal use only and not begin gusset decreases as follows for individual distribution or sale round 1 k until 3 sts rem before instep sts k2tog k1 continue in pattern across instep k1 ssk k to end round 2 k around continuing in pattern across instep sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 64 72 sts rem in total the beginning of the instep is now the new beginning of the round foot continue in pattern across instep until desired length is reached approximately 2 less than total foot length toe round 1 *k 1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of n2 k2tog k1 *repeat across needles 3 and 4 4 sts decrease round 2 and 3 k all sts repeat rounds 1-3 until 36 sts rem in total 9sts per needle then decrease as follows round 1 work as round 1 above round 2 work as round
